fields_of_interest: Culture and media, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Youth, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Communication, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives:
- Employment, social affairs and inclusion  
- Gender balance in decision-making positions 
- Equal economic independence 
- Visa policy  
- Immigration and Integration  
- Consultation on the European Union's (EU) legislation on the legal migration of non-EU citizens (Fitness Check on EU legal migration legislation)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
The magazine is a tool for promoting the role of women in business and politics in relation to the European integration of Ukraine.  
In terms of the approximation of the legislation of Ukraine to the EU-law we inform the society on changes and positive outcome of the EU-policies. We care about gender equality. We look for the positive experience in promoting women's role in different fields.  
The magazine is a tool to get the information and communicate it to the broad audience, show examples of success.  
The big event that took place in April in Ukraine was the Business Woman Forum. As a key speaker there was MEP Rebecca Harms and other successful women of Europe. We plan such events in different member states of the EU, particularly in Belgium.
goals__remit: The goal of the Magazine is to inform the public on European integration of Ukraine and raise awareness about the role of Europe for Ukraine and vice versa, and all that through empowering women on the social, political and business levels. Our audience also receives the insight of the process of the implementation of the Association Agreement. They get the info on the vision of the European politicians about the cooperation between Ukraine and Europe
